description: With an average of just 8 guests and a maximum of 15 guests, TruExperiences Tours has gained a reputation for delivering award-winning, small group tours. We specialize in fully guided day tours of Toronto and Niagara Falls. With a genuine, guest-focused experience in mind, we offer both a dedicated, certified driver and a first-rate tour guide. It is our mission to deliver the most sought-after attractions with the finest driver and guide team possible. It’s our privilege to be your host as you witness beautiful vistas and new horizons. Private tours are also available. Let’s go exploring together!

reviews.title: Well-Organised Small Group Tour to Niagara
text: This premium small group tour was perfect, with only 7 of us on the day (though the max is 15). With both a driver and a tour guide, we felt well taken care of.
The pick-up in Toronto, from several designated hotels, was prompt and efficient, and we set off in a comfortable Mercedes van with leather seats, and water was kindly offered by the hosts.

The commentary on the drive to Niagara was informative, and the trip was well-organised, including convenient washroom stops. I would have appreciated a bit more time at Niagara-on-the-Lake, but lunchtime at the falls was more than sufficient.
The boat trip was exciting, though it only lasted about 30 minutes. Keep in mind, a good portion of the day is spent travelling to and from the destination.
Overall, we really enjoyed the day, though the small group experience does come at a premium price.

reviews.title: An absolute MUST!
text: What a fantastic day out! My partner and I decided to sacrifice a day we had whilst in Toronto, and absolutely so wrapped we did! Our tour guide Sasha and our driver Michael were FANTASTIC! The perfect balance of information, relaxation and self exploring… honestly could not have asked for a better tour!
Our only negative was due to us arriving into Canada the day prior, we hadn’t gotten to an ATM to tip them both! Please forgive us Sasha and Michael!
Thank you once again for looking after us so well! :-)

reviews.title: You gotta immerse yourself….
text: Hi gang,
We brought the next generation with us to Niagara Falls to experience this awesome phenomenon.   Having been here before, we knew what to expect.
Getting on the boat we were able to secure the “sweet spot”, right up front along the rails, in your face, welcome to Niagara !!!

Breezy and cooler down at the water (duh), we had jackets / over shirts on under our high-quality poncho you put on.  As we neared the falls, it got wetter and wetter.   The grandkids loved it.  I couldn’t see, let alone video the awesome immensity of this natural wonder as we were literally immersed in the experience….translation:  getting wetter !!!
The noise, power and sound of the falls is what you’re after.  The boat pilot brought us right up to what seemed like the edge of the water, watch out for overhead barrels coming’ atchya.
This is as much of the Niagara Falls experience as any other, you don’t want to go back home tell your friends you “mist” it
Fantastic !!!
Rich

reviews.title: Thrilling
text: I recently took a solo tour to Niagara Falls and it was an unforgettable experience. Div was knowledgeable and made sure to accompany me and make me feel at home. Every moment was captivating. I never felt rushed and had plenty of time to take photos and soak in the scenery. Highly recommend TruExperiences for anyone looking to explore Niagara, whether you're solo or with a group!

reviews.title: Disappointing tour guide.
text: This was my first and only trip to Niagara Falls. It is truly a magical destination.

I am not a fan of anyone who reads from a script. My tour director read nearly everything from her script. SO BORING! Tour directors can make or break a trip and unfortunately, I did not experience a professional tour guide. Very little personal interaction.
Definitely, not worth the investment.

reviews.title: Perfectly planned day!
text: A perfectly planned day! We were picked up at our hotel right on time in a clean, new van. The first stop at Niagara on the Lake was lovely and the amount of time was just right. It’s a beautiful little town with nice shops and restaurants. We enjoyed the lunch overlooking Niagara Falls and some free time to walk around the area. It was exciting to be so close to the falls on the boat ride and you can choose to get wet or stay dry. Our guide Elena and driver Vick were exceptionally friendly with lots of interesting information. Highly recommend this tour! Worth every penny.

reviews.title: Great day out
text: We went on the small group day tour to Niagara Falls and had a fabulous day. Our tour guide, Sebastian made us feel welcome from the monument we were picked up at our hotel. The bus was comfortable, we spent a good amount of time at each spot and enjoyed seeing the area sound Niagara as well as the Falls which are truly spectacular. The boat cruise right up to the Falls is great fun. But you will get wet! The only downside was the meal at the Table Rock House restaurant - it was pretty awful. I would advise to skip it.
Thank you Sebastian for a great day out.

reviews.title: Stunning Niagara Falls Tour
text: We spent a fantastic day at Niagara Falls and the very pretty Niagara on the Lake and would recommend TruExperiences and this tour. We were a small group of nine which helps the smooth running of the day. Our guide, Patrick, was great, making the day very interesting and fun. Our driver, Marion, was so good and looked after us very well, especially during a big storm on the way back. It was a hot day and we were given lots of water.

reviews.title: Niagara Falls
text: A fantastic experience all round. There were 11 people on our very comfortable bus. Our guide Patrick was awesome…. He was very knowledgeable, interesting and engaging with everyone. The falls of course were magnificent and the boat ride so worth it.
The view from the restaurant was definitely worthwhile. The service was great. Food ok, but we weren’t really there for the food . Book the lunch.. I’m glad we did. Highly recommend this tour.

reviews.title: A great Niagra experience from the TruExperience team.
text: Went today on the tour to Niagra on the Lake and Niagra Falls.
The small group made it really easy and enjoyable. The vehicle was modern, clean and smooth.
Our driver and guide was excellent. They were knowledgeable, friendly and helpful.   There were queue jumps where needed, and enough time to enjoy the views.
Overall I couldn’t praise it enough, and would recommend it to anyone who is thinking about a great day.

reviews.title: Amazing day!!!
text: Danielle and Michael were the perfect guides. We had the most amazing day with so much knowledge imparted to us . Danielle took so much time to ensure that the day ran smoothly. Could not have asked for a more special trip to the falls.

reviews.title: Mistakes that could have been avoided
text: The trip could have been great but the company made some rookie mistakes that could easily have been avoided.

1) For some reason, we drove to the falls for the boat trip, then the town for lunch and then back to the falls to go behind the falls. Even our guide didn't understand why that was the route and it wasted hours.

2) The guide didn't realize that as a tour group, we could have skipped the behind-the-falls line. We only found out by watching the guides for other groups do it. While our guide seemed new and didn't know, the company should have absolutely known and told the guide. Again, more time wasted.
Our trip was supposed to be 6-7 hours and it ended up being 10. There was no traffic so this extra time was just due to mismanagement.

reviews.title: An Unforgettable Journey and Stellar Service!
text: Our recent day trip to Niagara Falls from Toronto with TruExperiences Tours was truly unforgettable. The tour was splendid and exceeded all our expectations. The tour guide and driver were not only highly knowledgeable but also incredibly amiable, making our journey all the more enjoyable.

Niagara Falls and Niagara on the Lake are indeed must-see destinations, and exploring these spots with TruExperiences made the experience even more rewarding. The staff's professionalism, care, and attentiveness were genuinely remarkable and deserve special mention.

However, what really stood out for us was the exceptional customer service we received after I left my mobile phone in the tour van at the end of the day. Being on a holiday from Australia, this phone was not just a device but a lifeline with our entire itinerary, flight bookings, accommodation details, and more. It was a freak-out moment for us.

Luckily, we were able to reach out to TruExperiences via email, and their response was immediate and empathetic. They understood the gravity of the situation and went out of their way to help us. By approximately 8:30 pm, a member of their team (apologies as I have forgotten their name) had delivered my phone back to me at our pick-up/drop-off location. Their swift action ensured our holiday remained on track.

We cannot thank TruExperiences enough for their exemplary service. This act of kindness and professionalism showed us that they genuinely care about their customers, making our tour experience even more memorable. We would highly recommend TruExperiences Tours to anyone looking for an amazing tour experience backed by a team that goes above and beyond for their clients. They are indeed true to their name – delivering truly exceptional experiences!

reviews.title: Very good small group tour.
text: It was an excellent Tour with a small group of people, our guide and driver were very friendly and did an excellent job. I feel the price is high for what you get, at the end I regretted not renting a car and doing everything on my own, but of course, having all planned is more relaxing. Everything was right on schedule, I would suggest leaving more time on Niagara on the Lake for free lunch, vs waiting 2 hours on the stop at the Niagara center because if you don't have lunch with the group, there is not a lot of food, and the only other option is fast-food. More time on Niagara on the Lake and time for lunch there would allow everyone to enjoy the town, its restaurants, coffee and ice-cream shops.

reviews.title: Great Experience
text: What a wonderful experience!  Nigara Falls was beyond my expectations.  The small group van was great.  Our guide Sasha made the trip go very smoothly.  I loved it.

reviews.title: Great team, Great tour.
text: The pick up went flawlessly, and on time. The tour team was knowledgeable, and made the trip enjoyable. I had unfortunately left my cell phone on the bus upon returning to my hotel.
They we gracious enough to return it to my location.
Great team, great tour!

reviews.title: A great tour!
text: We were glad we went with this option although it was a bit more expensive. It was relaxing to travel with a small group. Our guide and driver (Marian I think) were great and picked us up and dropped us off at our Airbnb. There were no sales pitches during the entire trip. We got to see what we wanted to see. We would highly recommend this tour!

reviews.title: A day out at a spectacular place
text: A really enjoyable day out with our guide Daniella & our driver Apollo. Daniella was very professional and accommodating from the moment we were picked up (on time) to the moment we were dropped off. She didn’t talk too much & allowed us to enjoy the sites but kept us entertained all the way there with bits of information & even a fun quiz !! The boat trip, the falls, the scenery, Niagara on the lake were all fantastic. Lunch was average but we didn’t care - it was fine for what we needed. Lucky that crowds weren’t too big so early June good time to go. Good driving from Apollo - took his time on the way there & then did his best to get us home quickly through the traffic. Daniella was terrific throughout.

reviews.title: A must do at the Falls
text: This is our second time doing the Niagara Falls and we loved this cruise company.  They provided us with waterproof ponchos and the did some work, but you do get a little wet.  Was so much fun.  The staff were really nice and helpful. Definitely would recommend.

reviews.title: Amazing
text: The tour was great and Haroon. (Guide) was excellent! We stay the day in Toronto and planned maximizing it. Haroon made the process very easy.

reviews.title: Soooo  worth the price :-)
text: My daughters and I LOVED this tour.  Small group so easy to navigate stops. The lunch was delicious.  Elena was a personable and knowledgeable guide. Dom a safe driver.  The van was very comfortable.  Hotel pickup was very convenient.  I highly, highly recommend this tour.

reviews.title: Fantastic experience
text: Fantastic day with our fabulous guide and driver, so knowledgeable and friendly , they did their best to make our day perfect

reviews.title: Well worth it
text: We had an amazing time despite the weather. Our guide was very engaging throughout our trip. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Patrick was Great!
text: Patrick was a great guide, knew lots of stuff and had real character. He made the trip interesting and fun. The Falls were, as always, amazing.
The only blot was the lunch at the Table Rock restaurant which was late, service was poor and the food was mediocre.
Apart from that a great day.

reviews.title: Niagara Falls day trip
text: We did a small group, only 10 in our group. Daniel was an excellent tour guide. As well as our driver Michael.

reviews.title: Beautiful day!
text: Danielle and Michael were great. We started a few minutes later than expected and I appreciated the easy communication to assure me all was well. Trip was awesome and they extended the time back to ensure we had the full experience. The view from the restaurant was incredible, so I would recommend adding the lunch to your day when booking.

reviews.title: TruExperiences Small Group Niagara Falls Tour
text: Our tour was with TruExperiences and it was fantastic. One of the best day tours I’ve had. Our guide Danielle was amazing, lots of information about Canada, the falls and surrounding areas. Even had a pop quiz for a bit of fun. Our driver Apollo was terrific as well and the day ran very smoothly with stope for great photos! Our small group were friendly and great company for the day. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Awesome day!
text: We had an amazing day with Patrick as our guide… really enjoyed learning about the local Canadian culture and also the spot in Niagara by the lake!

reviews.title: See Toronto from the inside
text: Great day, hosted and run by the incredible Patrick. We learned a huge amount and saw Toronto in a totally different light. Special thanks to Obey who very patiently dealt with, and worked around the Falun Gong demos and Indy race road closures.

reviews.title: Loved this tour.
text: We did a luxury small van Niagara Falls tour Sunday July 2, 2023. I cannot remember our guides name and feel bad about that as she was fabulous. The day was well-executed with stops for lunch and a cute little town. We loved it ---the ride was comfortable and guide informative with many stories. She took great care of everyone and made sure we were all comfortable, I cannot recommend this tour enough it was memorable.

reviews.title: Great day out with Sasha and Michael
text: In my opinion this is the best way to travel from Toronto and see the Falls, up close and personal. From the pick-up in downtown Toronto, to the drop off later that evening, Sasha and Michael were excellent hosts. Shared lots of interesting facts about the areas we were travelling through and made sure we were in the right places at the right time, to enjoy our day. Really liked the trip to Niagara on the Lake, which was a lovely town and a great opportunity to see rural Niagara, as well as the more urban areas. The Falls do not disappoint. Breathtaking and very wet! Thank you Sasha and Michael for a great day. Would thoroughly recommend.

reviews.title: Great day tour
text: It was a great day. Great driver & tour guide who passed on lots of knowledge. A very nice small group of people in tour- even had lunch with some of  them. The Niagara Falls experience was great fun & spectacular.
Niagara by the Lakes was a lovely place to wander & browse the shops.
I would highly recommend this tour. Thank you

reviews.title: Niagara
text: Great trip to Niagara. Well organised. Sasha was an informative guide and I would highly recommend booking. Falls were amazing

reviews.title: Visit to Niagara Falls.
text: Great excursion to see Niagara Falls and the town of Niagara on the Lake. Sasha, our guide, was knowledgeable and friendly and was very organised at all times. The minibus was okay with comfortable seats and we made good time despite being warned to expect heavy traffic. Stops were planned to enable comfort breaks and time to take in the surroundings. Our trip included the boat trip into the falls which was spectacular, exciting and unsurprisingly, wet, due to the mist created by the power of the falls. It’s a shame that autumn is arriving late this year as the trees weren’t quite the amazing colour-fest we had hoped for (obviously not the fault of the trip organisers!).
Niagara on the Lake was a beautiful and worthwhile visit to a town which has remained locked in time after being rebuilt in the 1840s following the American/Canadian war.
Superb trip - highly recommended.

reviews.title: A wonderful experience; felt like being amongst friends!
text: This was an amazing experience, with TruExperiences Tours as recommended and booked through Freedom Destinations (also first class). Patrick was an outstanding guide, teaching us lots about the area and life in Canada, as well as The Falls themselves. Great driving by Marion, too. To be collected from right outside our hotel on our first full day in Canada and to be treated to insighful facts and humorous anecdotes and a neatly coordinated visit to Niagara Falls, before being safely returned to the lobby of our hotel was an ideal way to get into our holiday. Both Patrick and Marion were/are great hosts. Our select group of 12 was also a pleasure to be part of, with a couple from Spain, and two couples from Australia and the four of us from Scotland. Thanks so much!

reviews.title: Amazing Niagara Falls trip 06/10/2023
text: The trip was amazing from start to finish! The tour guide, Darren, was extremely knowledgable , friendly and professional. Darren was very attentive and took time to answer the many questions members of the trip asked. There were 13 of us in total on this trip. We had a boat trip at the falls as well as stopping at several other places such as seeing the Whirlpool Aero Car and Niagara on the Lake. We highly recommend this trip!

reviews.title: SKIP THE LUNCH OPTION!
text: The pickup at the hotel was quite late and the traffic was horrible making us late on both ends of the trip.  The lunch option is quite expensive for the quality of the lunch provided.  On our tour two couples had not selected the lunch option and the guide had therefore made then an a la carte reservation an they were able to order a very nice lunch of much higher quality for perhaps half the cost.  SO SKIP THE LUNCH OPTION!

reviews.title: Great days sight seeing!
text: Fantastic tour - you won’t be disappointed! Sasha our tour guide was fantastic! Tour held our interest front start to finish… never once wished it to be over (like others we’ve been on)… saw loads! Driver Mike was great - felt safe on the roads

reviews.title: You will love it!
text: This was a fantastic tour!  The tour guide, Danielle was superb, and Apollo, the driver, did a great job navigating all the traffic.  Niagara Falls was spectacular!  Danielle had everything set up and helped to navigate the process.  Lunch was one of the many highlights since our table over looked horseshoe falls, so beautiful, and the cod lunch was very delicious.  A few stops after the falls then came back; traffic was not pleasant.  The van was comfortable and picked up/dropped off us up at the hotel.  If you are in Toronto and want a special tour to Niagara Falls, then this is the tour for you.  You won’t be disappointed.  Yes, you will get wet but that is part of the experience.

reviews.title: AMAZING !
text: Thank you it was an amazing trip !!
And the service went beyond normal service (forgot phone and got so much help!!). THANK YOU!! Danielle and the driver were amazing :-)
